name: John Curtin
what_did:
John Curtin led Australia during World War II.
He made tough decisions to protect the country.
He worked closely with the United States and helped defend Australia.
why_matters:
Curtin was a strong leader in a dangerous time.
He helped Australia become more independent.
Many people say he was one of our greatest Prime Ministers.

questions.q: What country did he work closely with?
What did Curtin do during the war?

options: He was a strong war leader

fun_fact: Curtin loved reading and once worked as a newspaper editor!
